	{\boxed{E_2^{\bullet,\bullet}}} && \bullet & \bullet & \bullet & \bullet & \bullet
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-6]
	\arrow[from=1-5, to=2-7]
\end{tikzcd}
